document.full_text: dana white, the bombastic president of ultimate fighting championship, whipped canadians into a lather last year when he said welterweight champion georges st. pierre was better known than hockey great wayne gretzky.
document.title: st. pierre turns hockey-mad canada into mma mecca
lines_and_colors: dana white, the bombastic president of ultimate fighting championship, whipped canadians into a lather last year when he said welterweight champion georges st. pierre was better known than hockey great wayne gretzky.
